Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.resource.list

Class ResourceListImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.resource.list.ResourceListImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of resource
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceList<T>
@API(status=STABLE, since="2.0.0-milestone.1.2") public class ResourceListImpl<T> extends Object implements ResourceList<T>
An implementation of a ResourceList that stores the resource entries in a HashMap. This resource list implementation relies on Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode().

    • remove

      public Optional<ResourceListOperationResult<T>> remove(T resource, long amount)
      Description copied from interface: ResourceList
      Removes an amount of a certain resource in the list. If the amount reaches 0 due to this removal, the resource is removed from the list.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface ResourceList<T>
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource, may not be null
      amount - the amount, must be larger than 0
      Returns:
      a result if the removal operation was successful, otherwise an empty Optional
